analysis.Summary: A Vue component that renders an album card with cover art, title, artist/year info, and a play button overlay. Clicking the card navigates to the album detail page; clicking the play button loads or reuses the album's tracks in the player queue.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable UI card for displaying music album entries in lists or grids, with built-in play functionality and navigation to album details.

Components.name: AlbumCard
Components.responsibility: Renders album cover, overlay play button, album title and info; handles click events for navigation and playback.

Components.name: Media
Components.responsibility: Displays the album cover image or a placeholder.

Components.name: Button
Components.responsibility: Renders a clickable play button with optional loader/success states.

Components.name: IconPlay
Components.responsibility: Renders the play icon inside the button.

Functions.name: albumInfo
Functions.description: Generates a string containing the artist name and release year (if available). Falls back to 'Unknown Artist' or just artist string.

Functions.name: playAlbum
Functions.description: Loads the album's tracks into the player. If tracks are already in the store, it uses them; otherwise it fetches tracks and then queues them.

parameters.name: album
parameters.description: The album object containing at least _id and metadata.

analysis.Usage: Import and register <AlbumCard> in a parent component or page. Pass an `album` prop object. Example: `<AlbumCard :album="album" />`. It can be used in album lists or grids to display clickable cards.
Notes: Uses scoped CSS for hover transitions on the card, overlay and play button.
Stops event propagation on the play button to prevent navigation when clicking play.
Provides a placeholder image if `album.coverUrl` is missing.
